hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that the Kokiri Sword is as effective as Deku Sticks against Dead Hand?

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.
